DOC.brief_summary: This register-based , epidemiological study HPV type distribution woman age 18 year recurrent conization follow primary conization high grade lesions/ microinvasive carcinoma . This study involve data collection different database Cancer Registry Norway .
DOC.brief_title: Study Natural History Human Papillomavirus ( HPV ) Infections Adult Women With Recurrent Conizations Norway
DOC.detailed_description: This protocol post update follow Protocol Amendment 1 ( 02 April 2010 ) . The section impact : enrolment , outcome measure eligibility criterion .
DOC.criteria: All subject must meet follow criterion study entry : Women age 18 year time collection primary cone specimen ; Who undergo first time conization due high grade lesion microinvasive cervical carcinoma , histologically diagnosed 2003 , possible extension backwards time ; Availability recurrent cone specimen high grade lesions/ microinvasive cervical carcinoma invasive cervical cancer ; Availability designate local laboratory primary recurrent cone specimens ; The cone specimen adequately preserve ; Written inform consent obtain subject . If subject decease , cone biopsy specimen use accord prior approval Ethics Committee .
